channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Floating Contact Button
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Floating Contact Button

item.title: CVE-2024-7891|2024-09-12T20:04:55.772Z -- unknown -- floating%20contact%20button
item.description: The Floating Contact Button WordPress plugin before 2.8 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when unfiltered_html is disallowed

item.title: CVE-2024-7891|2024-09-10T06:00:01.694Z -- unknown -- floating%20contact%20button
item.description: The Floating Contact Button WordPress plugin before 2.8 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when unfiltered_html is disallowed
